Title: Multiple-view time-resolved diffuse optical tomography based on structured illumination and compressive detection
Source: Progr. Biomed. Opt. Imaging Proc. SPIE
Abstract: © 2017 OSA-SPIE.A time-resolved Diffuse Optical Tomography system based on multiple view acquisition, pulsed structured light illumination and detection with spatial compression is proposed. Reconstructions on heterogeneous tissue mimicking phantoms are presented.
SubjectAreas: Atomic and Molecular Physics, and Optics
